channel.title: Features on Ilya Gutman
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Ilya Gutman

item.title: Borsch with Pork Ribs
item.description: INGREDIENTS Ingredient Amount beets 3 heads carrots 2-3 pieces cabbage ~ 1⁄2 head crashed tomatoes 1 14 oz jar onions 2 heads pickling spice 1⁄2 tsp pork ribs 1⁄2 rack pork hocks 1-2 pieces borsch spices mix 1 packet salt 1⁄2 tsp parsley 1 bunch dill 1 bunch basil leaves 2-3 pieces garlic 5-6 cloves black pepper ~ 10 vietnamese chili 1 tsp distilled water ~ 2 gallons (potatoes) 2-3 pieces INSRUCTIONS Half a rack of pork ribs clean, cut and start boiling in the cold water, for about 2 hours.

item.title: Crock-Pot Beef Roast
item.description: INGREDIENTS Ingredient Amount Instructions potato 6 peeled and cut into large chunks carrots 5 peeled and cut into 2-inch slices onion 1 quartered roast 2-3 lbs boneless chuck roast broth 1⁄2 cup beef or chicken broth chives 1 table spoon chopped parsley 2 table spoons chopped pepper 1⁄8 tea spoon soup mix 1 oz package onion soup mix sause 2 tbs Worcestershire sauce soup cream 10 oz can cream of mushroom soup INSRUCTIONS Put potatoes, carrots and onion at the bottom of crockpot.
